(¬(A25 → (A24 → (A20 ∨ A21))) → A27).prover9_expression: (-(assesses(agency, legislation) -> (targets(legislation, industry) -> (regulates(legislation, emissions) | subsidizes(legislation, renewables)))) -> compliant(industry, legislation))
(¬(A25 → (A24 → (A20 ∨ A21))) → A27).natural: If it is not the case that if the agency assesses the legislation then if the legislation targets the industry, either the legislation regulates emissions or the legislation subsidizes renewables, then the industry is compliant with the legislation.

(¬(A25 → (A24 → (A20 ∨ A21))) → ¬A27).prover9_expression: (-(assesses(agency, legislation) -> (targets(legislation, industry) -> (regulates(legislation, emissions) | subsidizes(legislation, renewables)))) -> -compliant(industry, legislation))
(¬(A25 → (A24 → (A20 ∨ A21))) → ¬A27).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the agency assesses the legislation then if the legislation targets the industry, either the legislation regulates emissions or the legislation subsidizes renewables, then it is not the case that the industry is compliant with the legislation.

(¬(A29 → (¬(A25 → (A24 → (A20 ∨ A21))) →.prover9_expression: (-(rejects(agency, legislation) -> (-(assesses(agency, legislation) -> (targets(legislation, industry) -> (regulates(legislation, emissions) | subsidizes(legislation, renewables)))) -> compliant(industry, legislation))) -> penalizes(agency, industry))
(¬(A29 → (¬(A25 → (A24 → (A20 ∨ A21))) →.natural: If it is not the case that if the agency rejects the legislation then if it is not the case that if the agency assesses the legislation then if the legislation targets the industry, either the legislation regulates emissions or the legislation subsidizes renewables, then the industry is compliant with the legislation, then the agency penalizes the industry.

(¬G → A1).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the legislation is beneficial for the environment, the public supports the legislation.

A43.natural: The supreme court rules on the challenge.

A8.natural: The organization lobbies for the legislation.

G.natural: The legislation is beneficial for the environment.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the public supports the legislation.

¬A14.natural: It is not the case that the president overrides the senate.

¬A15.natural: It is not the case that the legislation is enacted.

¬A2.natural: It is not the case that the public opposes the legislation.

¬A3.natural: It is not the case that the activist introduces the legislation.

¬A30.natural: It is not the case that the agency penalizes the industry.

¬A31.natural: It is not the case that the lobbyist corrupts the process.

¬A35.natural: It is not the case that the legislation is controversial.

¬A36.natural: It is not the case that the legislation is polarizing.

¬A7.natural: It is not the case that the organization funds the activist.

¬A9.natural: It is not the case that the activist influences the legislation.
